gyp ERR! configure error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: Python executable "/Users/Lteins/anaconda/bin/python" is v3.6.0, which is not supported by gyp.
gyp ERR! stack You can pass the --python switch to point to Python >= v2.5.0 & < 3.0.0.
